titles.title: Justice Disarmed by Innocence and Applauded by Prudence

texts.textentryhtml: Guillaume Mazade de Saint-Bresson, probably Hotel Castanier, rue des Capucines, Paris (1763-); ?art market, Aix-en-Provence, France (early 1970s); anonymous sale, Christie’s, London, July 18-19, 1974, lot 96 to James; Central Picture Galleries, New York (in 1975, sold to Princeton University Art Museum).
